text: Recently, on some podcasts I listen to, there are ads about Facebook "supporting internet regulation" to combat misinformation and enable data portability. attachments.title: He got Facebook hooked on AI. Now he can't fix its misinformation addiction
attachments.text: Three years ago, the company began building "responsible AI." This is the story of how it failed.
